## Step 1

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
d <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/difiore/ada-datasets/main/KamilarAndCooperData.csv")
set.seed(42)
```

## Step 2

```{r}
ggplot(d, aes(x = MaxLongevity_m, y= Body_mass_female_mean)) +
  geom_point()

ggplot(d, aes(x = MaxLongevity_m, y= log(Body_mass_female_mean))) +
  geom_point()
```
